law.text:
A person whose license has been revoked may apply for reinstatement no earlier than one
year from the date of revocation, in accordance with the procedures established by the board by administrative regulation under KRS Chapter 13A.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 11, effective July 15, 2014. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 525, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1998.
